001.errorMessage: No internet connection possible. Please check your connection.
001.additionalInformation: Please check your router and cables. Perhaps re-connect with Wi-Fi.

002.errorMessage: Got wrong response. Please try again later.

403.errorMessage: Authorization failed. Please check user rights.

404.errorMessage: Website not found. Please check URL.

500.errorMessage: Internal Server Error. Please try again later.

502.errorMessage: Invalid response received. Please try again later.

503.errorMessage: Request could not be handled. Please try again later.

504.errorMessage: Gateway Timeout. Please try again later.

undefined.errorMessage: Connection not possible. Please check your network devices and connections.
